title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta. Cook bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine everything and season.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Grill chicken. Prepare sauce. Combine and simmer.
